question: Which of the following is the consequence if NOTA votes exceeds 50%?
option2: It does not affect the election results
option3: Election is again organised in constituencies where NOTA vote was more than 50%
answer: It does not affect the election results
explanation: NOTA votes does not affect the election results even if the NOTA votes exceed 50% of the total votes cast. The winner is selected on the basis of rest of votes by first past the post system.
